entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as a person who was nearly caught by Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a group that cornered Kingsley.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as the one who informed Ron about Kingsley being cornered by Death Eaters.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is discussing with Harry about the doe and its possible sender.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is away from Ron and Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a possible sender of the doe.

entities.name: doe
entities.description: The doe is mentioned as an animal that was sent by someone.

entities.name: lynx
entities.description: Lynx is mentioned as the Patronus of Kingsley.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: Patronus is a concept that is associated with Kingsley and his ability to defend himself against Death Eaters.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: The sword is mentioned as an object that was used by Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Kingsley was cornered by Death Eaters.
Ron speculated that Dumbledore might have sent the doe.
